member.name: M:PollyTestApp.Controllers.NonThrottledFaultingController.Get
member.summary: Returns a simple string array of values.

member.name: M:PollyTestApp.Controllers.NonThrottledFaultingController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Accepts a simple integer parameter, which is written back to the response in the form of a simple message. Faults by delaying for a fixed period, before responding.
member.param: Integer value that gets returned in the response message.
